ModMetaData.description:
-> research Servers -> fabricate Servers -> build Server Racks -> fill Server Racks with Servers -> power Server Racks -> produce Resources with Server Racks -> use Research Speed of Server Racks with High-Tech Research Bench -> keep the Server Room cool
